lead_paragraph: His playing days dwindling, Mark Teixeira gave himself a moment to savor Wednesday night and rescued the New York Yankees in the process.

headline.print_headline: Teixeira Hits Game-Winning Slam, Yankees Stun Red Sox 5-3
headline.main: Teixeira Hits Game-Winning Slam, Yankees Stun Red Sox 5-3

snippet: His playing days dwindling, Mark Teixeira gave himself a moment to savor Wednesday night and rescued the New York Yankees in the process....
